title: Chara (footballer)
text:
Fernando Agostinho da Costa (born October 10, 1981 in <a href="Luanda">Luanda</a>) better known as Chara, is a retired <a href="Angola">Angola</a>n <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Xara has played for <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Petr%C3%B3leos%20Luanda">Petro Atlético</a> since 2006 and has also been a member of the <a href="Angola%20national%20football%20team">Angolan national football team</a> since 2006 and has 17 caps for the team. He was not called up for the <a href="2006%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2006 FIFA World Cup</a> due to his lack of experience. But, he was called up for the <a href="2010%20African%20Nations%20Cup">2010 African Nations Cup</a> due to the injury to <a href="Andr%C3%A9%20Macanga">André Macanga</a>.
